data.text: @henrycooke Thanks for this tip! 👍 Hope you are feeling better, and got some rest yesterday (😀).
@ChungWingKit @henrycooke Thank you! I'll need to give this a shot. here's the NZ website for anyone interested. They have candies too! https://t.co/HCyrEQW9By

@henrycooke As a single independent well documented case, you present a threat to the narrative that #covid is just a mild head cold (or doesn't exist). Those expousing such views can't allow a single credible counterexample to be documented without being attacked and credibility challenged.
@h_appleby @deekersinnz @Japes_alive @henrycooke Same company, different product, so, obviously no.
@ThirdEyeBlind9 @henrycooke Don't think salt kills covid like betadine does. But better than nothing.
@trilognath @KnowsHamilton @henrycooke Those evil antvaxers have been recommending this for a long time. But treatments are bad as they cause vaccine hesitancy. Can't have that.
@stuntkiwi @henrycooke this "guy" is one of the reasons the left suddenly want to ban Joe Rogan. He just gives out logical advice like using Betadine. Outrageous. Ban him.

@henrycooke Shh all treatments must be banned. Just ask @annastaciamp. They cause vaccine hesitancy. And remember taking the vaccine (that doesn't stop the spread) is more important than treating covid. Mentioning treatments might get you labelled an antivaxer.
